name: Aboleth

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Eldritch Restoration
traits.description: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in 5d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mucus Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14).

actions.name: Consume Memories
actions.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed or Grappled by the aboleth. Failure: 10 (3d6) Psychic damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Dominate Mind (2/Day)
actions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target.

actions.name: Lash
actions.description: The aboleth makes one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Psychic Drain
actions.description: If the aboleth has at least one creature Charmed or Grappled, it uses Consume Memories and regains 5 (1d10) Hit Points.

actions.name: Foul Water
actions.description: Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. Creatures that drink such water must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

actions.name: Psionic Projection
actions.description: While in its lair, the aboleth can cast Project Image, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16).

description: In aquatic abysses, aboleths dream of dead empires and orchestrate plots that unfold across ages.

name: Chuul
languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The chuul can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the Detect Magic spell but isn't itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chuul makes two Pincer attacks and uses Paralyzing Tentacles.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14).

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature Grappled by the chuul. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition and the Paralyzed condition. Repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

description: Chitinous servants of aboleths that snare creatures in massive pincers before rendering foes helpless with paralytic tentacles.

name: Cloaker

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the cloaker has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cloaker makes one Attach attack and two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Attach
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the cloaker attaches to it. While attached, the target has the Blinded condition, and the cloaker halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Phantasms
bonusActions.description: The cloaker casts the Mirror Image spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the cloaker starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

bonusActions.name: Moan
bonusActions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 60-foot Emanation. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the end of the cloaker's next turn. Success: Immune for 24 hours.

description: Mysterious Underdark predators that use their mottled hides to blend in and unfurl to smother unsuspecting prey.

name: Flumph

traits.name: Advanced Telepathy
traits.description: The flumph perceives the content of any telepathic communication within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Prone Deficiency
traits.description: If the flumph receives the Prone condition, roll a die. On an odd number, it has the Incapacitated condition. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph makes a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, ending the Incapacitated condition on a success.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.description: The flumph's thoughts can't be read by any means, and magic can't detect its location or observe it remotely.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Acid damage.

actions.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature within 15 feet. Failure: The target is coated in foul-smelling liquid, exudes a stench for 1d4 hours, and has the Poisoned condition while the stench lasts.

description: Bizarre Underdark creatures that are helpful to strangers, communicating telepathically and by changing color to reflect moods.

name: Gibbering Mouther

traits.name: Aberrant Ground
traits.description: The ground in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the mouther is Difficult Terrain.

traits.name: Gibbering
traits.description: The mouther babbles incoherently while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet. Failure: Roll 1d8: 1-4 does nothing, 5-6 moves randomly, 7-8 attacks randomly.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d6) Piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Blinding Spittle
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere within 30 feet. Failure: 7 (2d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the end of the mouther's next turn.

description: Amorphous heaps roiling with eyes, teeth, and strange organs that exist only to feed and to unleash their disdain for reality.

name: Grell

traits.name: Abduct
traits.description: The grell needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The grell makes one Beak attack and one Paralyzing Tentacles attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 10 ft. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11. Failure: Poisoned and Paralyzed.

description: Silent predators that defy gravity and perceive their surroundings via sound and electrical fields.

name: Nothic

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nothic makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Rotting Gaze
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature within 120 feet. Failure: 17 (5d6) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage.

bonusActions.name: Weird Insight
bonusActions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 120 feet. Failure: The nothic magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

description: Cursed lore seekers transformed by secrets never meant to be known, with bodies warped into otherworldly shapes.

name: Otyugh

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The otyugh makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature Grappled by the otyugh. Failure: 16 (3d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the otyugh's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

description: Otyughs live to eat -- the more disgusting the meal, the better. In dumps, sewers, and murky depths they devour garbage and anything their tentacles can reach.
